role.descr: item / entity taking place of other
item / entity being substituted by the other

example.name: autogen1
example.text: the Transportation secretary to block corporate raiders from waging proxy fights to oust boards that oppose a leveraged buy-out

example.name: autogen2
example.text: In 1986 , Baker , Nye waged a proxy fight for control of Leaseway Transportation Inc. that ultimately led to Leaseway 's being sold .
